patterns: What i have to do after sign up is complete?

responses: Congratulations! You are now eligible to take our quiz. The quiz is based on the field you opted for when you signed up. Be sure to pay attention; you must score 60% or higher to move onto the next step.

responses: Its free but you need to pass the quiz with a score of  more than 60% and than you are eligible to take goods.

patterns: How do you verify information from employers and talents?
What is the verification procedure for accounts?
responses: Hala Talents is exclusive. Applicants are required to pass a quiz to qualify themselves. Employers are properly vetted to ensure their information is accurate. Anyone found falsifying information will be permanently banned from using our services.

patterns: How do I find the right candidates?
As a company how can i select right candidates?
How to choose good candidates using your portal?
What is the selection procedure of candidates?
responses: Our process is automated. You simply sign up, and we connect the talent to you. We only provide applicants that are relevant to you and your requirements.

patterns: Does Hala Talents contact interested parties for the employer/talent?
How does Hala Talents search for
responses: The beauty of it is you don't! Our AI automatically matches you up to employers. We take your skills and other factors into consideration and match you with organizations that need you! Make sure your profile is on point!
